content.value:
Seniority on a team sometimes means doing the shitty/boring/annoying thing so that your teammates can do the fun/exciting/growth thing. 

Does it get you promoted? Probably not. 
Is it a sign of true leadership? Absolutely.
content.html: Seniority on a team sometimes means doing the shitty/boring/annoying thing so that your teammates can do the fun/exciting/growth thing. Does it get you promoted? Probably not. Is it a sign of true leadership? Absolutely.
